SAINT.Name: Venerable Nicetas the Confessor, Abbot of Medikion (+824)
Venerable Illyricus the Monk of Mt. Myrsinon in the Peloponnesus
Martyrs Elpidephorus, Dius, Bithonius, and Galycus
Virginmartyr Theodosia of Tyre (+ 307-308) and Martyr Irene
Martyrs Euagrius, Benign, Christos, Arestus, Kinnudius, Ruthus, Patric, and Zosimas
Icon of the Mother of God 'the Unfading Bloom'
St Nicétas le Confesseur, Higoumène du Monastère du Médikion
St Elpidophore, Sts Dios, Bythonios et Galycos
Прп. Никиты исп., игумена обители Мидикийской (824)
Мчч. Елпидифора, Дия, Вифония и Галика
